titleStmt.title: The entertainment of the Lady Monk, at Fishers-Folly. Together with an addresse made to her by a member of the Colledge of Bedlam at her visiting those phanatiques.
titleStmt.author: Yolkney, Walter.

notesStmt.note: At foot of text: If any other speech shall be printed pretending to be spoken before the Lady Monk at Fishers-Folly, they are false and disowned by W.Y.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
